intro.paragraph1: Macbadka Orbital waa dayax-gacmeed leh hawl faneed: xasuus bannaanka bannaanka ah oo u furan qof kasta oo ku nool ama ku noolaa Dunida.
intro.paragraph2: Iyada oo loo marayo habka tignoolajiyada, qof kastaa wuxuu u diri karaa magaca qof macbadka, ama mid dhintay, qof aad u nool, ama qof kasta oo mudan in la xasuusto.

sculpture.heading: Farshaxanka
sculpture.paragraph1: Farshaxanku waxa uu leeyahay saddex walxood oo isku xidhan: dayax-gacmeed gaar ahaan loogu talagalay in lagu kaydiyo balaayiin magacyo ah; sawir caam ah oo xogta la isku weydaarsanayo dayax-gacmeedka; iyo mareegaha ay ka qaybgalayaashu magacyadooda ku soo diraan hadda ilaa ay ka baxayaan jannada.
sculpture.paragraph2: Dadaal badan oo kala duwan, Macbadka Orbital waxa loo tixgalin karaa farshaxan goob gaar ah, meel bannaan ah. Sidoo kale waa mashruuc Artsat ah.

antenna.heading: Anteenada Sida Farshaxanka Dadweynaha
antenna.paragraph2: Anteeno si toos ah ula xiriiri doonta dayax-gacmeedka orbital ayaa la naqshadeeyay.
antenna.paragraph3: Iyada oo leh dusha sare ee muraayadda dahabka ah, muraayadda cirka ka sarreeya, waa bar bilawga kicinta ballaaran (ama xiriirkayaga waxa 'halkaas ku yaal').
antenna.paragraph4: In kasta oo farshaxannada aan lagu rakibin inta badan adduunka, Frames-ka Dunida, oo hadda gacanta ku haya dayax-gacmeedka, ayaa soo diraya magacyada meel kasta oo marin ah.
antenna.paragraph5: Ka caawi in aragtidan la keeno magaaladaada-ku rakib farshaxannada anteenada kuwaas oo dhiirigelinaya wada sheekaysiga ku saabsan sahaminta meel bannaan, farshaxanka, iyo meesha aan wadaagno ee cosmos. Wax badan ka baro taageerada mashruuca .

imageCaptions.riseNy: Macbadka Orbital ee meel bannaan. Samaynta 3D ee RiseNY&Partners.
imageCaptions.mercosul:
Ku rakibida Macbadka Orbital ee Mercosul Biennial, ee Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Sawirka waxaa qaaday Clara Marques.
